meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rebecca Fahrendorf Robert Morgan Benni Adkins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4427.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Rebecca Fahrendorf, a validation engineer from Indianapolis, Indiana
Robert Morgan, a high school teacher from San Juan Capistrano, California
Benni Adkins, a school lunch lady from Glenpool, Oklahoma (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,600)

tr.td: PLACES TO GO BEFORE YOU DIE
MOVIE SOUNDTRACKS
LITERARY CROSSWORD CLUES "L"
FAMOUS VALEDICTORIANS
THE U.S. ARMY
VERBS
